goal: Autonomously build all modules from UI → backend → database → integration until 100% production-ready.

Add role-based access (admin, parent, teacher, finance, admissions)

Create children list UI with CRUD screens

Build invoice view page with breakdown
Build optional services selection interface (checkbox groups)
Display academic results UI for parent
Hook all pages to backend controllers + models

tasks: Design Admissions Dashboard UI (pending, approved, rejected counts)
Insert student into students table on approval

modules.name: 4. Student Management Module

Add medical and guardian info fields
Integrate with backend using Student model

tasks: Create UI for assigning subjects to classes

modules.name: 6. Teacher Portal

Build Grade Entry UI (CA, Exam, Total auto-calc)

Create invoice detail UI with items table

modules.name: 9. Admin Settings
tasks: Build user management UI (list, create, edit)

modules.name: 10. Notifications & Messaging

tasks: Connect to SQL queries and models

final_integration_tasks: Verify all navigation links and routes
Fix broken pages or missing includes
Ensure all UI pages use same layout + design tokens
Connect all CRUD and form submissions
Full end-to-end testing for each user role
completion_criteria: The entire School Management System is built, integrated, fully functional, bug-free, visually consistent, and production-ready with no missing modules.
